text:
I want to create a report that will show a how much a list has grown over time. For example, on day 1 the list had 100 contacts. On day 2 we added 20 contacts so the list is at 120. And then so on.

The catch is that I don’t want it to take into consideration contacts that leave the list. So if 50 people _left_ the list on day 3 (and no one new was added), the chart should still say 120 people as of day 3. I’m thinking that what I need to do is chart it out using the “Added to List Date” field. But that field only exists if the contact is still on the list.

Is there any way to make this work?
Hey Folks - Curious if anyone knows of a way to see what template was used for a Quote that was published and or expired? Was checking Quote Details to no avail. Thanks in advance.

Is it possible if i subscribe to the premium Content Hub, and integrate it with the CRM on the our existing shared account?. means that one account for content hub and another account for CRM
